name: logseq-datenlp-plugin
author: hkgnp
description: This super simple plugin uses NLP to parse your content for dates and times so that they can be easily tracked through your yournal pages!

scripts.dev:start: pnpm add @logseq/libs -S && pnpm add @types/eslint @types/node @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser eslint eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-prettier prettier vite vite-plugin-logseq vite-tsconfig-paths typescript -D
scripts.dev:tailwind: pnpm add tailwindcss cssnano autoprefixer -D && touch tailwind.config.js && touch .postcssrc.cjs && touch src/tailwind.css

title: logseq-datenlp-plugin
